Name: Student Solutions Manual for Fundamentals of Physics

ReviewList.Text: This solutions manual only provides answers for a select few problems from each chapter.  It seems as though the author chose to show solutions for the easiest ones, leaving the most difficult problems out.  Each time I run into a problem I need help with, this book fails to provide the solution.  Most of the ones that I'm able to figure out on my own, such as most of the "no-brainer" ones, are the ones that this book covers.  Waste of money as I'm using google more often than I'm using this useless book.
This manual is hardly a solutions manual. If you are expecting all of the odd numbered problems to be solved you are in for a surprise. I can get more help by googling most questions.

When I found out that I could get a solution manual to my physics text, I was really excited. The text only provides the answers to odd problems but doesn't help you solve them. This book isn't that much better. Don't get me wrong, it has solutions. However, it only has solutions to like, I dunno, every tenth problem and they are usually the problems you can figure out on your own anyway. My mistake for not looking into this book before I bought it. I hope I can get some money for it come buyback.

I wish I had read the other reviews before I purchased this book.  It is complete garbage.  You are better suited to just go to your campus's tutorial sessions as this book has almost no answers.  The other reviews were spot on with the harder questions not being demonstrated in this book.  I wish I could sell it, but my conscience wouldn't allow me to take someone else's money for this book.  DO NOT BUY!

Such a waste of money. I ended up paying for a subscription to cramster so much better. The solutions in the book were only a select few and they were difficult to follow. I'd recommend not buying this book.

My daughter who used this manual said it did not give enough examples/solutions to the problems.  She informed me that it was not very useful and would not have had me order it knowing what little help it was.

SAVE YOUR MONEY AND DONT GET THIS. WISH I WOULD HAVE READ THE REVIEWS ONLINE BEFORE PURCHASING THIS ONE. NOT HELPFUL AS MANY OTHER STUDENT MANUALS ARE. VERY FEW PROBLEMS IN THE BOOK FOR THE MONEY AND HORRIBLE EXPLANATIONS....BUYER BE FOR WARNED THIS BOOK IS BETTER LEFT ON THE SHELF!!!!!
Does not even have half of the problems solved, there is a full free version floating around at certain campuses, would recommend those instead of this rip off

I must concur with everybody else's negative reviews. I would definitely keep this book in your trunk.............so you can use it to start a fire if you ever find yourself stranded in  the middle of nowhere on a cold winter night. As another reviewer mentioned, there is a decent makeshift manual floating around on the internet with complete worked-out solutions for everything. That internet version is much better than this one, but even the helpful internet version contains a fair amount of typographical errors that will drive you insane. In short, there is no good solution manual for this textbook. Hopefully you have an approachable professor and/or helpful teaching assistants, because you'll need them if you plan on doing any of the reasonably challenging practice problems in the book.

This book is truly awful. It does not explain things clearly and skips steps in the explanations. As other reviewers have written in, do not waste your money. And, as a side note, if you do need it, be aware that renting for the first semester will cost you only $16, but then extending that rental for another semester will cost you an additional $55. Unfortunately I am away from home and can't return it in time so much extend.

DO not buy it! It is hard to believe that it is a solution manual cos there are just a few problems that they solved and you can't even find most of the answer for the exercise. Wish I help you save your money by writing this review. I am going to return mine too.
Only has some problems in it. Most we're not on my home work. I would not get it at all.

This book does not work all the problems in the text and it does work what I consider to be the important ones.  I enjoyed using it because it helps the student stay on track with actually working through problems and explaining how to think about them, how to express them, and then (the best) how to solve them.  Using this framework the student is able to come away with tools to work similar problems within the textbook.
This is affordable and very helpful book. With this book, I can help my child learn Physics much easier. Also it's great self-learning book.
I purchased this book for a family member going to college.  It costs a lot less on Amazon than at the college book store.  Thanks Amazon.
